name: SquareInTheDark
description:
Solve puzzles and mazes, because the life of the world is in your hands, pick a side and make your decision.

Controls:

  • Move with arrow keys or WASD
  • Interact with Enter/Return key

Credits:

  • Game by: ItsColden
  • Sounds by: TobyFox

This game was made for the GeoJam2 under the theme ("Pick a Side").

Please leave a comment and tell me your thoughts about it! Have a nice day!
